response.overview: When a mysterious disturbance begins threatening Coral Cove, Stellar Tony, the heroic sea turtle detective, is called into action. Joined by his loyal friends Hammy the hammerhead shark, Duncan the clever dolphin, Goldie the ever-energetic fish, and Val the compassionate vaquita, the team sets out to investigate. Along the way, they encounter hidden dangers, unravel ancient secrets, and discover the legendary Glowing Coral, a mystical artifact said to hold the power to heal the oceans.  But the adventure takes a dangerous turn when King Abyss, a cunning and power-hungry ruler from the depths, plots to use the Glowing Coral for his own dark agenda. With time running out, Stellar Tony and his team must outwit King Abyss, restore harmony to their underwater home, and prove that the greatest treasure of all lies in friendship and teamwork.  Dive into the ultimate oceanic adventure in this heartwarming, action-packed film that celebrates courage, unity, and the beauty of the sea!
response.title: Stellar tony:THE DEEP SEA ADVENTURE
